verses.roman:
advaita-ācārya-gosāñi bhakta-avatāra
kṛṣṇa avatāriyā kailā bhaktira pracāra

synonyms: advaita-ācārya—Śrī Advaita Prabhu; gosāñi—spiritual master; bhakta-avatāra—the incarnation of a devotee; kṛṣṇa—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; avatāriyā—descending; kailā—did; bhaktira—of devotional service; pracāra—propagation.
translation: Śrīla Advaita Ācārya Prabhu appeared as an incarnation of a devotee. He is in the category of Kṛṣṇa, but He descended to this earth to propagate devotional service.
